channel.title: Developmental Scaffolding on The Approximate Mind
channel.description: Recent content in Developmental Scaffolding on The Approximate Mind

item.title: The Approximate Mind, Part 36: The Village in the Machine
item.description:
No child was ever raised by one person.

This is not a limitation we have struggled to overcome. It is developmental architecture. The village is not a backup system. It is the system.
